function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of collaboration and communication in implementing biofiltration technology in architectural design","Impact":"Increased risk of disease propagation and indoor air pollution","Mitigation":"Establish clear communication channels and collaboration protocols among stakeholders, engineers, and scientists","Technologies":"Communication platforms, project management software, and collaboration tools","People":"Architects, engineers, scientists, building occupants","Owner":"Stakeholders, project managers, architects"},{"Description":"Unsustainable or ineffective maintenance and control strategies for biofiltration technology","Impact":"Potential failure to purify indoor air and maintain a healthy indoor environment","Mitigation":"Develop comprehensive maintenance protocols, training programs, and monitoring systems","Technologies":"Sensors, IoT devices, data analytics software","People":"Maintenance staff, building managers, engineers","Owner":"Facility management, building owners, engineering teams"},{"Description":"Incomplete or unverified safety results and solutions for biofiltration technology","Impact":"Exposure to potential hazards and risks to human health if the technology is not adequately tested and certified","Mitigation":"Conduct rigorous safety testing, certification processes, and continuous monitoring","Technologies":"Biological testing equipment, safety certification tools, environmental monitoring devices","People":"Scientists, researchers, regulatory authorities","Owner":"Research institutions, regulatory agencies, scientific community"}]}
